flawed_nl_solution:
If they ate 60/100 of the pieces of cake, the friends ate 60/100 * 240 pieces = <<60/100*240=1200/3>>1200/3 pieces of the cake.
The total number of pieces remaining is 240 pieces - 1200/3 pieces = <<240-1200/3=-160>>-160 pieces
When Juelz divided the remaining pieces of cake to his sisters, each sister received -160 pieces / 3 sisters = <<-160/3=-160/3>>-160/3 pieces/sister
#### -160/3

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 144, not 1200/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
